name: Pixel Salon
description:
This game is still in development! 

Have fun coloring pixel people's hair! This game is simple and relaxing and is a great way to wind down after a long day. Choose whether you want relaxing lo-fi music playing in the background by clicking the audio buttons!

I've spent roughly 5 hours on this so far and is made entirely with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. All of the art was done by me!

Soon to be features

The next feature I'm hoping to accomplish is to make each customer random!

Why should I buy this?

I'm a 17 year old self-taught programmer trying to save for a nice computer for college, as I want to get a game development degree. It would mean the world if you could help me on my journey!
